mapper.select: SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user_role.role_id, sys_user_role.user_id, sys_user.user_name, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.mobile, sys_user.email FROM sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = sys_user_role.user_id WHERE sys_user_role.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user.id as user_id, sys_user.user_name, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.mobile, sys_user.email FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user.del_flag = 0 AND sys_user.id not in (SELECT user_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE role_id = #{roleId})
